Package com.meltmedia.cadmium.cli

Interface Summary
AuthorizedOnly The interface to implement in order to tell CadmiumCli instance that the command that implements this interface should be authenticated in the Github API.
CliCommand The interface to implements in order to be discovered by the CadmiumCli.wireCommands method.
 

Class Summary
AbstractAuthorizedOnly Implements functionality to facilitate authentication to Cadmium rest endpoints.
BranchCreator Supplies helper methods to help in git repository management.
CadmiumCli The core class to every Cadmium command line interface commands.
CheckGithubTokenCommand A Cadmium cli command that does nothing other then force the CadmiumCli instance to check and authorized the current user with a GitHub API token.
CloneCommand CLI Command that clones the content from a source to a target.
CommitCommand Replaces the content in a git repository branch with the contents of a given directory and tells a Cadmium site to update to it.
DeployCommand This command is used to tell a Cadmium-Deployer instance to create and deploy a new Cadmium war.
HelpCommand An Object used to facilitate the help function of the Cadmium CLI.
HistoryCommand Retrieves and displays the history of the requested Cadmium site in a human readable format.
InitializeContentCommand Creates a content directory for a Cadmium site.
InitializeProjectCommand Deprecated.  
InitializeWarCommand Initializes a Cadmium site war for deployment without Cadmium Deployer war.
MaintenanceCommand Controls a Cadmium sites maintenance page.
NewBranchCommand Deprecated.  
RevertCommand Displays the history of a Cadmium site and allows a selection of a revertable history entry to revert the site to, in normal mode.
StatusCommand Displays the status information from a Cadmium site.
UndeployCommand Displays a list of Cadmium wars deployed to a JBoss server with a Cadmium-Deployer war deployed and tells it to undeploy any of them.
UpdateCommand Sends a raw update command to a Cadmium site.
UpdateConfigCommand Sends a raw update config command to a Cadmium site.
ValidateCommand Parses all html files in a directory with a Jerry Library.
